channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Spacer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Spacer

item.title: CVE-2022-3618|2024-08-03T01:14:02.855Z -- unknown -- spacer
item.description: The Spacer WordPress plugin before 3.0.7 does not sanitize and escapes some of its settings, which could allow high-privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example, in multisite setup).
